title: CHKDSK
extract: CHKDSK is a system tool in DOS, FlexOS, OS/2 and Windows. It verifies the file system integrity of a volume and fixes logical file system errors. It is similar to the fsck command in Unix.
extract_html: CHKDSK is a system tool in DOS, FlexOS, OS/2 and Windows. It verifies the file system integrity of a volume and fixes logical file system errors. It is similar to the fsck command in Unix.
